name: End of the World Pinball
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare #50 Jam : Delay the Inevitable

Introduction

A deadly asteroid is heading right for Earth! We need to gather our things and leave!

Your Mission

In order to escape the dying planet, you must complete a set of tasks:

 1. Refuel the Spaceship

 2. Load provisions

 3. Clear the path of asteroids

 4. Launch the spaceship

 5. Steer it into the wormhole.

Controls

A, D - Control left and right paddles respectively

S    - Hold to launch the ball

Changes

The JAM version of the game contains only minimal fixes. So far,  these are:

v.1.0.1

* added 'quit game' button to game over screen

* 'hitter' and 'sink' features now award points

* plunger sound plays on 'S' key down
